attributes.action: Allow  all Ghurka Soldiers right of settlement in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To support all Ghurka Soldiers for the right of settlement in the United Kingdom after years of service to the crown. Further, the right to equal treatment with regard to their pay, pensions and living conditions.
These soldiers have proved their loyalty over many years and do not deserve to be treated as second class citizens.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
